meanings.definition: Relating to the rule of a czar.
meanings.sent1: The czarist palace was grand and opulent.
meanings.sent2: The czarist family lived in the royal palace.
meanings.sent3: The czarist cat ruled over the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her czarist demeanor commanded respect from all who met her.
meanings.sent5: The czarist crown sparkled with precious gems.

meanings.definition: Supportive of the czar or czarist regime.
meanings.sent1: The czarist supporters cheered for the monarch's decisions.
meanings.sent2: Many nobles were loyal to the czarist government.
meanings.sent3: The czarist cake was the favorite dessert at the royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: His czarist loyalty never wavered, even in difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The czarist flag waved proudly over the castle walls.
